mapper.select:
SELECT oli.oli_no, oli.olt_no, oli.title, oli.content, oli.img_path, oli.price, oli.level, TRUNCATE((SELECT AVG(star_rating) FROM online_lecture_reply olr WHERE olr.oli_no = oli.oli_no),0) star_avg, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM online_lecture_like oll WHERE oli.oli_no = oll.oli_no) like_cnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM online_lecture_reply olr WHERE olr.oli_no = oli.oli_no) reply_cnt
GROUP BY oli.oli_no
ORDER BY oli.oli_no DESC
ORDER BY like_cnt DESC
ORDER BY reply_cnt DESC
ORDER BY star_avg DESC
ORDER BY price
ORDER BY oli.oli_no DESC
LIMIT #{page}, #{pageSize}
mapper.sql:
FROM online_lecture_introduction oli, online_lecture_tag oltag, online_lecture_sub_type olst, online_lecture_request olr WHERE oli.oli_no = oltag.oli_no AND oli.oli_no = olst.oli_no AND enable = 1 AND oli.oli_no = olr.oli_no AND olr.approval_status = 1 AND oli.origin = 1
AND oli.title LIKE '%${searchTitle}%'
AND olst.sub_type_no IN (SELECT sub_type_no FROM sub_type WHERE main_type_no = (SELECT main_type_no FROM main_type WHERE main_type_abbr = #{main_type_abbr}))
AND olst.sub_type_no = (SELECT sub_type_no FROM sub_type WHERE sub_type_abbr = #{sub_type_abbr})
AND
oltag.tag_no = (SELECT tag_no FROM tag WHERE tag_abbr = #{tag})
AND oli.level = #{level}
AND oli.price = 0
AND oli.price > 0
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM online_lecture_like WHERE oli_no = #{oli_no} AND m_no = #{m_no}
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM online_lecture_like WHERE oli_no = #{oli_no} AND m_no = #{m_no})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO online_lecture_introduction(olt_no, title, introduction, content, img_path, price, level, reg_date, update_date, enable, origin) VALUES(#{olt_no}, #{title}, #{introduction}, #{content}, #{img_path}, #{price}, #{level}, NOW(), #{update_date}, #{enable}, #{origin})
mapper.update: UPDATE online_lecture_introduction SET olt_no = #{olt_no}, title = #{title}, introduction = #{introduction}, content = #{content}, img_path = #{img_path}, price = #{price}, level = #{level}, update_date = #{update_date}, enable = #{enable} WHERE oli_no = #{oli_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO online_lecture_reply (oli_no, m_no, star_rating, content, reg_date) VALUES(#{oli_no}, #{m_no}, #{star_rating}, #{content}, #{reg_date})
INSERT INTO online_lecture_video (oli_no, title, s_file_name) VALUES(#{oli_no}, #{title}, #{s_file_name})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM online_lecture_video WHERE oli_no = #{oli_no} ORDER BY olv_no
